item.description:
Hello everyone. I want to introduce myself to you, my name is Reverend Gabrielle. I am a non- denominational mystical Christian priest. I have been meditating for over 14 years and taught yoga for a long time too. I am eager to meet others who are interested in meditation.

We will focus on learning skills to concentrate and relax so a connection can be made inside through quieting the mind and settling the feelings. Mysticism just means knowing through experience and what better way to experience God inside than through meditation.

The intention is to come together the last wednesday of every month for a Meditation and Mystical tea. This is what it will look like. We will start with a visualization or a short reading or subject to contemplate. After the meditation, we will discuss our experiences and talk about ways to deepen our practice.

I look forward to meeting you all and will be happy to see you there.

Oh yes, delicious tea will also be served.

In Light,
Rev Gabrielle
617-852-2822
item.name: meditation and mystical tea
